summary: The Veterans Health Administration has significantly expanded its telehealth services—offering health care appointments via video, for example. Telehealth can help veterans avoid traveling long distances for care, including those living in rural areas. In 2019, VHA launched a program to help veterans who don't have internet access get telehealth services by providing private locations equipped with high-speed internet. But in 2022 and 2023, 14 of...
title: Veterans Health Care: VA's Video Telehealth Access Program Would Benefit from Performance Goals and Measures
